ctu_text: Launched in 1975, it is one of the world\u2019s largest programmes providing for an integrated package of ", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Launched on 2nd October, 1975, the Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS) Scheme is one of the flagship programmes of the Government of India and represents one of the world\u2019s largest and unique programmes for early childhood care and development. It is the foremost symbol of country\u2019s commitment to its children and nursing mothers, as a response to the challenge of providing pre-school non-formal education on one hand and breaking the vicious cycle of malnutrition, morbidity, reduced learning capacity and mortality on the other. The beneficiaries under the Scheme are children in the age group of 0-6 years, pregnant women, and lactating mothers.
